Deemos and Inzola left the remote control that they were controlling Gangon
with on the table of the main room. Gangon had nightmares about BrightBlade
shoooting him...in the head...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 6:10 PM
Subject: What's Going On?!



* BrightBlade watched as Grimmler approached her further, still appearing to
be looking at the cuffs on her wrists. Her logical side telling her that she
should lash out and give him a good whack across the face, but the new
thoughts planted in her mind were stronger and they told her to let him come
close to her.
Her mind was in tangles but still the new thoughts bloomed and swamped out
the logic, her mind slowly clearing but with the thoughts planted within it
and not her own.
He was a Maximal but her spark was growing to love him, but her mind also
told her that she was a Maximal as well.
It was so confusing but also made perfect sense.
She watched him walk up to her and stop only inches away, yet so close that
she could feel the heat of his body.
BrightBlade slowly lifted her head and looked at him square in the face.and
blushed.
To her he seemed so handsome and so kind. She was quite taken by him.
She blushed deeper as he took her right wrist in his grasp, his fingers
gently rubbing against it. He was so gentle.
Lifting her gaze from her wrist to his eyes she suddenly found herself lost
in them, her mind giving out a last desperate cry of extreme warning before
being swamped by the new feelings.
BrightBlade brushed her own fingers against his and looked down at them,
still not quite sure what to make of this.
She felt shy, even though her body was still wracked with shivers and
damage.
Her voice was soft and barely a whisper. *

" Why."

* That was all she could manage to say, knowing that he seemed to love her.
She just guessed that she wanted to hear it from him, her new thoughts
wanting to hear the words from his throat to solidify themselves. *

( BB: That's OK, CODE. Gangon can break free and find a body. It might even
become interesting.)
